Articles.Content:
Is there a way to go about changing my handle? I'm kinda getting tired of this one (I've used it for a long time on other forums...probably should have thought it over a bit more before using it on this one).

Anyway, if it's not to much trouble I'd much prefer "Sidereus". ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Yeah I can do this but it'll change how you login, so I'll wait till you're online ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
